title: Beliefs on the ability to regulate negative emotions mediates the effects of competitive anger on task-focused self-efficacy in taekwondo athletes
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Luca Bovolon, Maria Rosaria Nappa, Salvatore Chiodo, Francesca Greco, Katia Folino, Maria Grazia Tarsitano, Maurizio Bertollo, Gian Pietro Emerenziani
